rules_text:
When this creature dies, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
Sequel {1}{R} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its sequel cost. If you do, it enters with a finality counter and it's a 1/1.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]If you see the smile, it's too late[/i]
